cards.name: Golden Touch
cards.originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has lifelink and gets +1/+1 for each color among permanents you control and cards in your graveyard.

rulings.text: This counts both zones as a whole, so the most it can give is +5/+5.

cards.name: Infuse the Apparatus
cards.originalText:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
Exile all cards from your graveyard. You may search your library for any number of instant and/or sorcery cards with different names that share a name with one or more cards exiled this way and cast them without paying their mana costs, then shuffle your library. Exile Infuse the Apparatus.

cards.name: Mystic Meddling
cards.originalText: Exile target spell. Then that spell's controller may cast a spell they own from outside the game that shares a type with the exiled card without paying its mana cost if able.

rulings.text: In a Constructed tournament, "outside the game" refers to that player's sideboard. In a Limited game, "outside the game" refers to all cards that player drafted that aren't in that player's deck or removed from that player's card pool. Otherwise, it refers to any card in MSEM.
